title: Request for example layout: captions on the sides of the chart
body:
I know this is largely a newbie Android layout question, but an example would be helpful for many, I think.
I want my own TextView lables around the chart and am struggling, especially with a lable on the LHS. I have enhanced the layout file from the FilledLineActivity example but only got so far. Help!
I include a screen shot and the layout file. In particular, how can limit the space taken by the left-hand caption, and have the chart fill more space?
![Captions_screenshot](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6894822/74484828-3a109580-4f1e-11ea-926a-f102239b2a25.jpg)


`
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:id="@+id/captionLayout"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">

    <com.github.mikephil.charting.charts.LineChart
        android:id="@+id/chart1"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="0dp"

        android:padding="0dp"

        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/textViewBottom"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/textViewLeft"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textViewTop" />

    <!-- Top caption -->
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/textViewTop"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="30dp"

        android:layout_marginStart="8dp"
        android:layout_marginLeft="8dp"

        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
        android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
        android:layout_marginRight="8dp"
        android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"

        android:background="#FFEB3B"

        android:text="Top Caption Here!"
        android:textSize="18sp"

        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/chart1"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

    <!-- Bottom caption -->
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/textViewBottom"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="30dp"

        android:layout_marginStart="8dp"
        android:layout_marginLeft="8dp"

        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
        android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
        android:layout_marginRight="8dp"
        android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"

        android:background="#FFEB3B"

        android:text="Bottom Caption Here"
        android:textSize="18sp"

        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/chart1" />

    <!-- Left caption -->
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/textViewLeft"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:background="#8BC34A"
        android:padding="0dp"
        android:rotation="270"
        android:text="Left Caption Here"

        android:textSize="18sp"

        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/chart1"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />


</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>


`

title: Chart Offset values as Percentages
body:
<!---
BEFORE YOU SUBMIT please read the following:

Please search open/closed issues before submitting since someone might have asked the same thing before!

If you have a support request or question please submit them on StackOverflow:
  https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/mpandroidchart
using the tags `android` & `mpandroidchart`

Please also look at the CONTRIBUTING file before opening an issue:
  https://github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md

Issues on GitHub are only related to problems with MPAndroidChart itself and we cannot answer
support questions here. We will close your issue without a response.
-->

**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
<!-- A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Ex. I'm always frustrated when [...] -->
While dealing with Pie Chart the radius is calculated based on the ```mContentRect```
To set that we need to provide Offset Values(Left, Top, Right, Bottom) as constant float values.
Instead of that, we can mention the percentages.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
<!-- A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. -->
Percentages for left & right with respect to the width, top & bottom with respect to the height restricting the sum of percentage is not more than 100

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
<!-- A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered. -->
For now, I'm Calculating it by getting the ```viewPortHandler.contentHeight``` and passing to the offset. But, while using a custom renderer sometimes height I'm getting is 0.
